dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. Shows California's gold region and western trails. "Entered according to act of Congress in the year 1849 by J.H. Colton ..." Prime meridians: Greenwich and Washington. "Printed at Ackermans r[ooms 120?] Fulton St. N.Y." Includes 2 insets, ill., and distance table. 1 map: hand col.; 39 x 55 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_title_s: Map of the United States, the British provinces, Mexico &c.; drawn & engraved by J.M. Atwood.
dc_creator_sm: Atwood, John M., approximately 1818-,Colton, J. H. (Joseph Hutchins), 1800-1893.
